Pre-Game Insights: India made it to the final four by virtue of topping their Super 8 group after beating Australia in their final Super 8 group game, thus putting Australia on the verge of elimination.
England finished 2nd in their Super 8 group, while South Africa topped the group with three wins in three matches.
England needed to win big against the USA in the final league game and they demolished the co-hosts, chasing down 115 in under 10 overs.
India have played all of their matches in the morning local time, which is evening time in India.
